DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free text field related to the other specify non-affirmative response to having determined the value, significance, or extent of an annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard of a body region on a patient referring to an upper or lower extremity.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
